episodes.title: Devil in the Family reaction | The Fall of Ruby Franke
episodes.description:
Ruby Franke was a MONSTER even before Jodi Hildebrandt came along | Devil in the Family 

Devil in the Family reaction | The Fall of Ruby Franke 

In today's video, I do a quick recap of the Ruby Franke case, and then I discuss the new docu-series, "The Devil in the Family - The Fall of Ruby Franke."

When I first started my channel, I covered this case in more detail. Click on the link below for that video:
https://youtu.be/Eri3dEvlmP4

I also did an update of Ruby Franke & Jodi Hildebrandt's sentencing:
https://youtu.be/_peiTiSSBsk

I definitely recommend that you watch the docuseries. It was well done and shows unseen footage of what took place behind the scenes while filming for their family vlogging YouTube Channel, 8 passengers. 

One thing this docuseries made perfectly clear, was that Ruby Franke was a monster of a parent, way before Jodi Hildebrandt ever came along. 

There is also more information on Jodi Hildebrandt and exactly how she managed to worm her way into the family. 

I also briefly discuss Ruby's oldest, Shari Franke's book "My Mother's House" and her experience of growing up as Ruby Franke's oldest daughter.

I hope you enjoy the video. Thanks for the support

#DevilInTheFamily #TheFallOfRubyFranke #RubyFranke #Connexions #8Passengers #Documentary #Hulu #TrueCrime #FamilyVloggers #YouTubeFamily #Cult #TrendingNow #Docuseries #WhatDoYouThink #CommentBelow #ShareYourThoughts

#rubyfranke #devilinthefamily #jodihildebrandt

episodes.title: Dad forms SEX CULT with College Students | Larry Ray
episodes.description:
Dad forms SEX CULT with College Students | Larry Ray 

Welcome to my channel where we delve into the dark world of crime, exploring infamous cases, true crime stories, and the psychology behind criminal behavior.  This video focuses specifically on the Sarah Lawrence College cult, examining the manipulative tactics used by Larry Ray, the experiences of survivors (Isabella, Daniel, Santos, Claudia, Felicia, Yalitza & Lee Chen), and the lasting impact of this disturbing case. We'll analyze the cult's leader, the recruitment process, and the psychological techniques employed to control members.  While my channel covers a wide range of true crime topics, this episode falls under my Cultish Crimes series & this in-depth look at the Sarah Lawrence College cult offers a chilling example of the dangers of cults and the importance of understanding their methods. Subscribe for more true crime content, including future deep dives into other fascinating and disturbing cases. 

If you'd like to binge-watch some Cultish Crimes episodes, click on the link below for the entire playlist:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WP3bVqaTuzM&list=PLRXB1R7odqFya68-MRX_JaTmR7cPrUc1O&ab_channel=CrimeRush

episodes.title: The LDS Doomsday Cult | Lori and Chad Daybell
episodes.description:
The LDS Doomsday Cult | Lori and Chad Daybell

An excellent channel that did a lot of coverage on this case:
Hidden True Crime Channel:
www.youtube.com/@UCBp03toXz-WZ6gSt7YtSdEg 

Today's video covers a case that is probably the most complicated case ever.
The main monsters of the story are Lori Vallow Daybell and Chad Daybell.
The cultish group they formed included:
Alex Cox (Lori's brother)
Zulema Pastenes (who Alex eventually married)
Melanie Gibb (Lori's bestie)
Melani Boudreaux (Lori's niece)
And of course Lori & Chad.

There were other members, but luckily they found their way out of this cult before things got really bad.

The victims:
Charles Vallow (Lori's fourth husband)
Tammy Daybell (Chad Daybell's wife)
Tylee Ryan (Lori's daughter)
JJ Vallow (Lori's adopted son)

Additional suspicious deaths:
Joseph Ryan (Lori's ex-husband)
Alex Cox (Lori's brother)
 
Lori Vallow changed husbands frequently and tried to justify and validate everything she did through her strange beliefs and faith.

Lori, a devout LDS member (AKA Mormon), got involved with the strange teachings of another LDS member and author named Chad Daybell. Once they united, bizarre things started happening, and together, the couple formed a group that led them down a path of delusions, darkness, and death.

Lori was prepared to eliminate anything that stood in the way of her being with Chad Daybell & their "mission". Sadly she eventually came to a point where she felt that her own children were in the way.

This is an unbelievably tragic story that has shocked the entire world.

My condolences to the loved one of the many victims in today's case.

#DoomsdayMom #Chad Daybell #LoriVallowDaybell

episodes.title: Kidwelly cul-de-sac Cult that ruined too many lives | Colin Batley | Wales Cult
episodes.description:
Kidwelly cul-de-sac Cult that ruined too many lives | Colin Batley | Wales Cult

The Kidwelly Satanic Cult was hidden in plain sight in Wales. Colin Batley declared himself the Prince Priest and leader of the group. He claimed to have direct contact with the gods and encouraged disgusting and demeaning rituals. 

Colin even involved his wife, Elaine and she also became part of this horrific cult.

Colin's followers were indoctrinated and brainwashed to believe that he was omniscient and this made it easy for him to control them. He allowed them little freedom and they even had to give him most of their income. He told them they were part of "The Church, " which was their main priority.

Colin did horrific things for financial gain, power, and his sick s*xual fantasies. 

#KidwellyCult #SatanicSexCult #ColinBatley

episodes.title: Cult Leader Who Got Away with EVERYTHING | The Family | Anne Hamilton-Byrne
episodes.description:
Cult Leader Who Got Away with EVERYTHING | The Family | Anne Hamilton-Byrne

Anne Hamilton-Byrne successfully managed to deceive hundreds of people into believing that she was the female reincarnation of Jesus Christ.

She formed a cult called The Great White Brotherhood but later changed its name to "The Family."

While growing more and more powerful, Anne's crimes became more and more heinous. Perhaps the most disturbing part of this true crime story is that she got away with it all.

Australian cult leader, Anne Hamilton-Byrne will forever be remembered as an evil person who took advantage of everyone she came in contact with. She ruined many lives, profited from it, and never paid the consequences.

#AnneHamiltonByrne #TheFamily #Cult

episodes.title: Killing for SUPERNATURAL Powers | The Nebraska Vampire Cult | The Case of Sydney Loofe
episodes.description:
SEASON 1: Cultish Crimes
EPISODE 1: The Nebraska Vampire Cult

Aubrey Trail was a convicted murderer who was sentenced to death for the killing of Sydney Loofe in 2017. During his trial, witnesses described him as a "vampire" who led a "coven of witches."

Murder Conviction: 
He was found guilty of first-degree murder and conspiracy to commit murder in the death of Sydney Loofe.
"Vampire" Claims: 
Witnesses testified that Trail claimed to be a vampire and leader of a coven. He also allegedly believed he had the power to fly and could increase his powers by killing people.
Controversial Figure: 
Trail's case attracted significant media attention due to his bizarre claims and the gruesome details of the murder.
Death Sentence: 
He was sentenced to death in 2021.
Waiver of Appeals: 
Trail later waived his appeals, effectively requesting the state to carry out his death sentence.

Aubrey Trail's accomplice in the murder of Sydney Loofe was Bailey Boswell. Boswell was also convicted of first-degree murder and sentenced to life in prison.

Accomplice in Murder: 
She was involved in luring Sydney Loofe to her apartment, where she was subsequently murdered and dismembered.
"Witch" Claims: 
Like Trail, Boswell also identified with a "witch" persona and was part of his alleged "coven."
Manipulation and Control: 
Evidence suggests that Boswell was manipulated and controlled by Trail, who exerted significant influence over her.
Life Sentence: She was sentenced to life in prison without the possibility of parole.

Killing for SUPERNATURAL Powers | The Nebraska Vampire Cult | The Case of Sydney Loofe
